snippet: The Supreme Court decided not to hear an appeal from a wedding photographer in New Mexico and a challenge to an Iowa law that bans contributions from corporations.
abstract: Supreme Court declines to hear closely watched cases on gay rights, campaign finance and lethal injections, giving no reason for turning down the appeals.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court decided not to hear an appeal from a wedding photographer in New Mexico and a challenge to an Iowa law that bans contributions from corporations.

headline.main: Justices Decline Cases on Gay Rights and Campaign Finance
headline.print_headline: Justices Won’t Hear an Appeal on Gay Bias

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
